reviewText: Movie appears to have been abridged
Adding a classic to our collection
There's no better Bond than Sean Connery. And the original Aston Martin car--featured in this film for the first time--was ahead of it's time. Watch out for Odd Job's hat!
Part of filling out my James Bond collection
This was for a Christmas gift.  I hope he liked it.
I received this yesterday, love James Bond and this is one of my favorites.

... this is it - a slam dunk as the best Bond film! With iconic characters such as Pussy Galore and Oddjob, and its great title song, AND with Connery at the top of his game, what else is there to say... except "007 Heaven"!!!
